website_summaries.verdict: Parents looking for a set of multi-functional bibs can save their money with this popular value pack.
pros: Double layered to keep baby dry
Can be used as an eating or drooling bib
Buyers appreciate the gender neutral designs
cons: Smaller than some customers were expecting

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Needed some cheap bibs to get us through the teething phase. My baby's clothes were getting soaked from all the drool - we had to change him multiple times a day because he was drooling straight through the other bibs he had. I chose these because there were 10 for a low price. My expectation was low considering the price, even more so when they arrived and I saw how thin they were. They sat around for a couple of days before I got around to washing them... but then I used them... what a lifesaver!! They really are drool resistant. Kept his clothes dry even when the bib itself was completely saturated. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Tiny neck hole
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2-month-old. While the images are cute, the neck hole is WAY TOO SMALL. My newborn is on the smaller side and I couldn't even velcro the back of the bib!! I worried it would be too tight and cut into her neck. I added an image for comparison. The left side is a standard size everyday bib, the right one is this product. Why did they make the hole so small?? I threw these away, it wasn't worth my time to return it, given that I'm busy with a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bought two sets of different patters from them, 1st pic is a comparison of “luvable friends” and this brand the Velcro for luvable friends is flat, for this brand it’s rough and looks itchy...I don’t want to risk my 2month old have scratches/rash all over her neck..That being said I didn’t even bother to take them out and I’m returning them for sure. & then I opened the other pack and one came ripped and the other one has thread hanging off.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Not soft and started to melt
customer_reviews.text: Not soft at all they almost stand up horizontally . And the back started to melt over itself and thus tearing apart after one month of use. I dry them in the dryer low heat
customer_reviews.author: Lara M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty neat 10pk bibs.
customer_reviews.text: At first I did not like these bibs. I thought they felt super cheap in material and would rip easily. We have been using these for our little one for at least 5 months and only 1 ripped. There are 9 others in the pack. For some reason, the white color ones do not clean as well as the other ones... it's really odd. They are super fun to match up with baby. The pack was inexpensive too.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Velcro not working after one month
customer_reviews.text: Update: after just over one month of use, the velco snap doesn't close as well and keeps falling apart. I only hand wash and since there are ten only use each about once a week. At this price, I was not expecting that good quality, but one month is just too short. Original: I don't like the look of these bibs (for a baby girl) but absolutely recommend them for use. They are not as absorbant as the jersey ones but the plastic lining is a life saver. It's not only good for teething but also for feeding puree and cereal. The color does not bleed - I washed them in cold cycle and line dried. Hope they will last.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: More for your money!
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the best options I had found. For the amount it came with, for the price. They were great and durable to use. Even though babies make nasty messes these held up very well. Always washed well, did not leak dye, and no need to dry. The back part is plastic so baby stays dry and free of food mess. Only problem after 8months his double cheeks n chin did not fit in the ring anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Yens

customer_reviews.title: Not sized for a baby
customer_reviews.text: The neck hole on these bibs are so large they leave a huge gap that’s more than 2-3 inches. It’s not useful to prevent spit ups from getting onto my sons clothing. I will be returning for this reason. I tried these on my 5 year old daughter and the neck hole was even a little large on her. The bib fit around my neck. These are not fitted for a baby or toddler. They do absorb and have a plastic lining on the back. The wash instructions say do not dry but I tested one in the dryer and it came out just fine.
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Quickly pilling in the wash
customer_reviews.text: The bibs do serve their purpose during mealtime for my baby but after several months of use their quality has gone down a bit (which could be expected but is still disappointing). I wash them separately with all Velcro closed and hang dry and the material is pilled, the Velcro is losing its stickiness and the plastic on several is beginning to break. However, the price on these is right and at this point we would be willing to invest in another set since they have done their job for a while. Just beware that they aren't great for long term use (as with a lot of baby items!).
customer_reviews.author: K.M.K.

customer_reviews.title: Non-absorbent
customer_reviews.text: These bins are extremely thin, and they do not absorb anything. When my son has spit up, it rolls right down off the bib straight onto his clothes anyways. Plastic backing does make it so that it doesn't seep through the babe, but since the bib is not catching it it kind of defeats the purpose. We have been putting a regular bib on top of these bibs, and that seems to work pretty well. I would not recommend buying these bibs. We originally bought two packs and sent the one pack back once we realize how ineffective they were.
customer_reviews.author: BJMMSW

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt absorb well
customer_reviews.text: These are not what I expected. They are a lot bigger and stiffer than I though. My Hope's with these were to keep my sons drool from absorbing through and into his clothes like they do with all his other bibs. But because these have the protective backing, the drool sort of stays on the surface. I'm not sure how to explain it but they remain really wet and it'll get on whatever runs against the bib. Yuck. I'd rather buy the full cloth ones and just change them out more often.
customer_reviews.author: laurlamae

customer_reviews.title: Good for starting out with foods.
customer_reviews.text: I got these specific for feeding time, not used for teething or drool. They work fine for what they are a cheap bib that prevents food from going onto his clothes. Not the highest quality but a good value for what they are. They are not an absorbent bib, but the material will catch a lot of the pureed food. I wash it out in the sink after each feed and then throw in the wash right away. The food comes out of them every time.
customer_reviews.author: kelly9484

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the drool away
customer_reviews.text: Worth its price. Bought a 10-pack for less than $10, and my baby drools a lot, and since it's waterproof it keeps the drool away from the shirt. Pretty happy with the purchase. After some time though the back material starts to crack and tear so I do recommend air drying them after the spinner / washer. I think the heat of the dryer breaks it up. I have been handwashing them since they are very easy to clean and it lasts longer that way.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: but not that annoying, uncomfortable plastic kind of water proof
customer_reviews.text: My son still (at 20 months) loves these bibs. We bought these when he first started solids (or puree's really) at 6 months. They're water proof, but not that annoying, uncomfortable plastic kind of water proof, but also small enough that they don't overpower the kiddo when they're younger. Even now, at 20 months, he still uses them, and they catch the majority of what he attempts to spoon into his mouth. But he loves them. And the Velcro never seems to run out! They're still holding strong!
customer_reviews.author: Cowgirlmethis

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was waste of money... these are cheap quality bibs that don’t really absorb well. When my LO drools, other brands soak in right away but this one just drips down onto the baby’s clothes. Every time the baby turns his head, the bib will rotate too so you constantly have to reposition the bib. Also, the inner part of the bib is made of vinyl causing rashes on the baby’s neck. I do not recommend this bib.
customer_reviews.author: Heta

customer_reviews.title: The bibs are okay
customer_reviews.text: The bibs looked like the ones in the product photo, not like the photos attached to the reviews. I was disappointed to learn that these do not go in the dryer. It's annoying to fish out a bunch of bibs from every load of laundry. I previously purchased a different set of Neat Solutions bibs that do go in the dryer and have fabric on both sides. I don't like the plastic backing. It makes them stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Size, Protects Baby
customer_reviews.text: This works great for feedings and drool from teething. This fits my twin 6 month old babies and they never seem bothered by the bib. I like that they help protect from wetness and helps to capture any spills from pureed foods. I have washed these several times in the washer and then air try and they have held up extremely well. Very convenient and affordable option. Plus very cute designs!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R

customer_reviews.title: Helps with drooling.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bibs. My 2019 baby is teething, and has his first tooth at 4.5 months old. The drool is on another level, non stop. These bibs help save his clothes a bit more. The neck is a little big so sometimes the drool will slip between the bib and onsie but it's not nearly as bad as going without. They're big enough that he likes to chew on them as well.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly as I expected. From the reviews I read it was larger than I expected. Neck hole is a little big formy 3 month old but still worked out. We are teething and have a lot of drool and these have done great. Clothes stay dry. Haven't washed any yet. Seem like they would wash ok but maybe better to air dr vs putting in the dryer. Very good product for the price for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Even Better Price!
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are the best! I purchased the boy bibs but they also have girl bibs. They come with very cute pictures and catchy phrases. The water resistant backing worked wonders especially while my child was teething and drooling excessively. It kept my baby's clothes dry and clean during feedings as well. They fit great around the neck meaning not too loose and not too tight. They are also easy to clean. I put them in the washer and dryer and the cloth nor the plastic backing didn't rip or tear. I am definitely recommending these to moms who want quality bibs at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I like that the bibs have a plastic lining so it helps keep drool from absorbing onto shirt. They have been washed and dried several times even with stain remover some stains don’t come out of the white ones, but the lining has not ripped or cracked. A few of the sayings aren’t something I would choose but the animals are all cute. For my baby who drools and spits up all of the time these are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amber S.

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: They get the job done but had I known how much noise they make and how stiff they are, I would have picked something else. My 5 month old is distracted by them so I guess that eliminates buying a toy. They are pretty huge, covers shoulders to almost belly button and always ends up in front of his face. I would recommend to use when baby eats solids.
customer_reviews.author: zuli

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These work great for infants in maybe 6+ months but I don’t think they’re good products for babies any younger than that due to the plastic. I imagine the plastic fits well with babies that teeth or constantly spit up but I myself prefer the full cotton made ones for my baby. I also dislike how cheaply made they look.
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: Average bibs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 6 month old who spits up a lot - they have cute design but not impressed with absorbency. The spit up just rolls off and we have to be quick to catch it! Easy to clean, cheaper fabric (you get what you pay for) and quite large around the neck for my son. He will definitely be able to use them for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, tablecloth-like feel
customer_reviews.text: I wish these would have worked out for my baby! He's nearly 4 months old and I was excited that they were wide and there was room to grow, so I washed them and tested one out, but something about the material didn't agree with his skin; It gave him little rash streaks on his cheek. Bummer. Although I'm not too upset they didn't work out because they weren't the softest terry on the top cloth side, and the bottom waterproof side was noisy and sounded like a plastic tablecloth.
customer_reviews.author: Monica H

customer_reviews.title: Good absorbing bibs but little stiff and thin
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are good in absorbing water and at a very good price. However, the only thing I wished can be better is the material little bit thin and stiff, so it would keep on sticking up in my daughter’s face every time she moves. It doesn’t really stay down too long. Other than that, it does what it supposed too!
customer_reviews.author: Bubblez116

customer_reviews.title: Great for absorbency
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are great until baby starts to crawl. The velcro isn't strong enough so when baby slides or crawls, it gets pulled off. Other than that, these probably are the best bibs out there for absorbency. Also, I learned the hard way to either air dry or set dryer on very low. This will help keep the shape and not melt the plastic. Overall, for what's available on the market, I'd definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great bibs for the price! The nylon/plastic backing makes it a bit more stiff than if it were just a fabric/towel, but then this is also more waterproof! Not as luxurious as the double-layered versions made by Carters and others, but it's also a fraction of the cost! I was concerned that the nylon backing would melt in the dryer (because others have), but after many cycles it's doing well. I was concerned about the neck size being too small (because Amazon-ians have complained), but FITS GREAT on my newborn and even my 4 year old. My little one is spitting up a lot so these are great to use to catch all that!
customer_reviews.author: Shushu

customer_reviews.title: good bibs
customer_reviews.text: good, large bib. they are big so i wouldn’t buy them for a young baby, wait until around 6 months and up due to the neck hole being big so they still get droll on their clothes. but besides that, they bib works great. no wet clothes, easy to clean and velcro to attach.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: They're best suited for utilizing them with doll babies. They're cute but lack real function. They're definitely for less than 6 months, good for light food residue but they're not great for teethers. They was up good but the velcro doesn't stick after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Nat Jon

customer_reviews.title: Good... Need minor adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Bibs are great large size, absorbent, nice bright colors. My only issue is the velcro attachment should be a longer strip to adjust length. Bibs don't fit close enough to neck so drool and spit up can get on clothes and skin. Defeating purpose of using bibs.
customer_reviews.author: FavorByFaith

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and poor quality
customer_reviews.text: If you need just a cheap thin poor quality bib, these are for you. They velcro in the back rather than the side which is not convenient. Super thin material and the back doesn’t even have a cloth back. It’s that waterproof material. Good thing it’s a cheap 10pk because I will use at least 5+ a day!
customer_reviews.author: Mandie

customer_reviews.title: Not functional or practical.
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are horrible, I do not recommend buying. They are velcro and not the hook fasteners as described! They are super thin and not absorbent at all! The neck is too big not secure that the baby will make a mess on themselves regardless. Also, they look and feel very cheap for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Classy C

customer_reviews.title: Noisy bibs, but does the job
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are ok. They are very plastic at the back and make a lot of noise if you are bottle feeding a sleepy baby. Not a quality product, but if you are looking for bibs that won't absorb through to the baby's clothes then it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic of USA

customer_reviews.title: these bibs are good. The colors are very bright
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these bibs are good. The colors are very bright, they are well embroidered. My only concern is that the plastic on the back is very thin. I wash them on a gentle cycle and dry them on the delicate cycle . I washed them several times and they are still holding up. I wouldn't dare to dry them under regular conditions, as the back will probably melt. The velcro seems strong enough. My baby is currently drinking milk-only and she makes a mess when she drinks milk and her clothes don't get wet. I'm not sure what will happen when she starts eating solids. I'll let you know!
customer_reviews.author: Mohan Bolisetty

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are great. They're on the small side, so correctly labeled DROOLER, but they're handy to have around for the grand daughter in any situation. They have a thin plastic backing, and I'm not certain if the baby doesn't like the crinkly sound, feel, or WHAT, but she doesn't seem to care for them. I use them anyway, since something is better than nothing when feeding! These will last long enough to get her through the baby teething/food phase and then I can toss them.
customer_reviews.author: Calgal

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise a REALLY great buy and great quality bibs
customer_reviews.text: I have a six month old son who is a messy eater and drools a lot (teething is SUCH a pain). I needed some bibs that would keep the moisture off of his clothes so I don't have to change him a thousand times a day and these are certainly doing the trick so far. The plastic-y size on the back keeps it from getting his clothes wet and clean up in the washer well. I haven't had any issues with them in the dryer, as it says to lay them out to dry. I may update if I have issues. Otherwise a REALLY great buy and great quality bibs!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It Has Plastic At the Back
customer_reviews.text: I dont really know how well these bibs absorb moisture because my baby dont dribble and he didnt have any spills.Also will update later down because he only use one bib so far .He has a variety.So thats the only reason I put one star.
customer_reviews.author: NIQUE

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great value.
customer_reviews.text: For the price they are well worth it. Have 2 New granddaughters in 2017. I ordered 40 drool bibs. I babysit them both so they use a lot of these bibs on a daily basis. They wash up great. Just remember not to put them on high heat in the dryer. I just pull mine from the washer and let them hang dry.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: You can add more Velcro
customer_reviews.text: I really like these bibs they are not bulky and they have a thin plastic coating on the back , i pre washed and for the price and the amount you recive even if the Velcro is not the strongest it's easily fixable just add more Velcro, thank you for making these for the price that I can continue to buy them !
customer_reviews.author: CapitalsFan

customer_reviews.title: Works well for messy baby’s
customer_reviews.text: The price for 10 of these is good. The product works good. Once one gets dirty I’m able to quickly swap it out for a fresh one. It absorbs líquids really good so when my baby is eating any liquid is caught and doesn’t drip onto my baby’s clothes.
customer_reviews.author: De La Fox Checks

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well to lots of washes
customer_reviews.text: These things can take a beating. I've had mine for months now and they have been washed soooo many times, no rips or tears yet. The light colored ones do get stained easily (duh carrots will ruin everything you own) but they do what they need to do. Great size, very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made bibs!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made! I am very disappointed in this product. My baby is 6 months and the neck holes are too wide and the Velcro does not stick well, he easily pulls the bib off. The fabric is coming off and I haven’t even washed them yet.
customer_reviews.author: AJR

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too small around neck
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandchild and they looked great. I was looking for ones with a backing so his clothes would stay dry. The only proble is that when his mother put one on it barley fit his neck. He is 9 months and on the small side but these were way too small at the neckline. Will have to return
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Small neck opening, run small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5 month old. Value for money is good, they are easy to clean, but they do run on the small side. The neck opening is smaller than expected. We will probably only be able to use these for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger babies
customer_reviews.text: These bibs are perfect for a baby 6 months or younger bcuz they are on the smaller side but they were perfect for my baby who was 2mths when I bought them. They have held up really well w multiple washes & dry and have the type of velcro that does not scratch babys sensitive neck. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Bacallao

customer_reviews.title: Finally Found what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Who knew finding the right bibs would be so difficult? These have the plastic lining on the back and are small enough to fit our 5 week old's neck so it catches his formula dribbles. They are cute and price was good too. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: T Payne

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the plasticy back. Twins didn't use once for teething and after second wash they started falling apart. Ended up throwing most away. Waste of money. I only use complete terricloth bibs now. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Roundy

customer_reviews.title: Good size & lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: We loved these for our 3+ months baby. They weren’t too big, and the plastic backing avoided any leak through onto baby’s clothing. Given that it is plastic, it can mold if it’s not dried out properly. To clean, I just throw it in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: 3sMom

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and pointless
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. My husband threw the packaging, otherwise I would have returned them. All fluids rolled right off them onto my daughter's clothing (including drool). Plastic like cheap feel and the velcro started pulling off most of them in the first use. I was embarrassed to give them to Goodwill. I felt buyers remorse with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: My boy drools a lot and goes through a few bibs a day and these are really cute and seem to fit the bill. As others has mentioned, they're really small and thin and are a little tight around the neck. That's fine as I needed something cheap to swap out of. Unfortunately, after a few wash, the bib started having discoloration and turned black. I don't know if it's the ink or stitching, but I would not put that anywhere near my kid. I purchased two pack and they all ended up in the trash after a few use. Even at the price point, i'm very very disappointed at the product.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: NEED.
customer_reviews.text: This is a MUST HAVE. I never knew how great water resistant bibs were, and have since replaced all non water resistant bibs in the house with these. My son loves to drip formula during his whole feeding, and these bibs make sure he doesn't need a wardrobe change every time he is hungry. I am glad we found them.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent BuyerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for protecting clothes,  not comfortable, lay flat to dry.
customer_reviews.text: My 2-month old spits up a lot, this bib helps protect his clothes, it is large enough to cover his whole chest. What I don't like about it is the plastic on the other side of the bib-it is noisy, hot, stiff, also having to lay it flat to dry is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Deb W

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love how these are perfect for my messy one. These have a cotton front and it plastic type back which is really great. The pictures and the wordage is very clear and cute. I will re order this and tell my friends they should also.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Henning💚

customer_reviews.title: Velcro doesn't stick after a few washes
customer_reviews.text: These bibs have a SMALL neck area, which is exactly what I was looking for. They are not meant for bigger babies. I started using them around 4-5 months old when my little one started drooling a lot. The bibs with the large necks wouldn't catch the drool. The velcro on these bibs are terrible. After putting it through the wash a few times, the velcro doesn't stick anymore. My little one rips these bibs right off because they are held on so poorly. Also, the first time I washed the orange bib, the color leaked onto his white onsie. I was able to wash it off with some scrubbing, but just beware! Next time I'm going to try.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ng

customer_reviews.title: Too big, too thin
customer_reviews.text: Bibs are way too big (for my 11 month old / 20 lbs) and are thin and plastic like. Still waiting for son to grow into them, but at this rate he won’t need bibs by the time he is big enough to use them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Brito

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I specifically wanted bibs with the plastic backs and these were just what i needed. Very cute. And good value for the number that you get. My only issue is the Velcro on some of them barely stays stuck together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 5 month old son well, I personally wish they were a little bigger. Just a heads up though, if you put them in the dryer, make sure it doesn't get too hot. The backs are a type of plastic and they can melt but I would still buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Nichol

customer_reviews.title: Love and hate
customer_reviews.text: My 8 Month old drools 24/7 so this does the job by keeping his shirts dry , i do not like that they're a bit cheap quality and make a lot of noise. I catch my baby trying to take them off. and they're wider and bigger than most of the average bib size so i only use these for when hes eating or drooling a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Reyes

customer_reviews.title: They are cute but not of the highest quality.
customer_reviews.text: They are cute but not of the highest quality. They are not very soft so i can't leave it on on my baby for more than the duration of his feed so sometimes i remove it even before burping him because his skin is very sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Hira Salman

customer_reviews.title: good buy!
customer_reviews.text: i wouldnt use these for all day droolers. i use them for feeding a 7mo old who spits up everything and likes to make a mess. hes a little chunky but they fit fine and rinse well. they have a water resistant back but the front doesnt feel as soft as others i have (ones he wears all day). i would buy again... over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste  your money
customer_reviews.text: These bibs don’t stay in place. The plastic behind the bibs make them shift and move constantly against baby’s chest. Also the Velcro is so loose on my 5 month old and he rips them off ALL the time.
customer_reviews.author: Peachy

customer_reviews.title: Too small, can't put in dryer, hazard
customer_reviews.text: You can't put these in the dryer even on the lowest heat setting because the plastic backing will melt. Additionally, the opening for the neck is not that wide, so it didn't even fit my 6 month old. Lastly, when I tried to sell them to a consignment store (I only tried one in the dryer and only tried to sell the others), they informed me that this type of thin plastic backed bib is considered a choking hazard and they could neither sell them nor donate them, recommending that they be thrown away.
customer_reviews.author: C. NM

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these bibs for four months now and still think they were a good buy. I purchased them to help collect all the baby drool and they certainly do the job. Five of the bibs are embroidered with animals or insects and the other five are embroidered with witty phrases to match the characters. Even after tons of washing, they seem to hold up. The velcro does soften a bit over time, so the hold isn't as strong, but they still stay on. The plastic backing prevents them from going in the dryer, but they don't take long to air dry. That plastic backing is GREAT at preventing baby clothes from getting drool soaked and causing rashes.
customer_reviews.author: slp527

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with these bibs! They are great quality for the price. They have the inside lining that keeps wetness from soaking through to babies clothes which is what the bibs are meant to do. Some foods stain but that's just a given and no big deal or deal breaker for me. Easy to wash and the material doesn't shrink and look weird after. The only down side is the velco is not that strong so if my baby is determined enough, he can pull the bib off.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne Bent

customer_reviews.title: I suspect these would work even better for a baby who spits up normal amounts
customer_reviews.text: These are just little cheap plasticy bibs. Nothing special, and tend to divert spit up rather than catch it. However, my GERD baby goes through sometimes 2 bibs a feeding, and we needed cannon fodder bibs. I suspect these would work even better for a baby who spits up normal amounts. What's really weird though is that the "catch phrases" for each image are written on their own bib, rather than on the bib with the animals. Makes for some really weird bibs...
customer_reviews.author: Jessa

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: These work great for formula spills. Very absorbent and keeps baby dry. I also use them when feeding solids because they wash up nicely in the washing machine. Great size for my small baby.
customer_reviews.author: Bullsfan13

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Super cute bibs the material is great I thought they were going to be cheapies but no they are just like the target ones that come in three packs I will be buying another pack of these cause my baby uses like 4 a day
customer_reviews.author: Evey310

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: These bibs work very well for feeding time and for drool and they are a little bigger/longer that other ones I have which is nice because then it protect the pants from getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Does it job
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and does it job. My son constantly spits up and these works wonder since the waterproof backing helps his clothes from getting soak. We washed & dried it on regular and so far they still held up. Only complain is, my son is only 3 months old and it is a little tight around his neck area already.
customer_reviews.author: Ceecee T

customer_reviews.title: Cheap (quality & price) bib that does the job
customer_reviews.text: I needed bibs desperately for when my son was teething. He drooled so much I would go through several bibs an hour.I got tried of doing extra laundry so I purchased these. They are not the best quality bibs ever. They are super thin and kinda crunchy which makes them not always lie flat. They do however have a plastic lining so no matter how wet it gets it doesn't soak through like his cloth bibs. Overall these are not the nicest bib in the world but did exactly what I needed, they are perfect for keeping babies clothes clean and dry and I would say for the price it was definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki_856

customer_reviews.title: An OK bib for occassional use.
customer_reviews.text: These are an ok bib if you are looking for something cute and cheap. My son is an extreme drooler. He typically goes through 4 of these a day as they get soaked. With constant washing the fuzzy side of the velcro is starting to wear. Downside is they can't go in the dryer or the plastic backing will melt. If I just needed a bib occasionally these would probably be fine. I originally chose these for their cuteness and low price. I've since bought better quality bibs and wished I would have done that in the beginning
customer_reviews.author: Ret Chief Wife

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: We really liked these bibs. For my shower I was given many terry cloth bibs that all soak through, causing my son to get his little chest wet after every meal. This solved the problem because they don't soak through. You get plenty of pretty colors and they keep from soaking. The only negative is that the neck is a little big so we really need to make sure that we pull it back so that he doesn't get milk on his clothes. Overall, they are great, and they wash well.
customer_reviews.author: mom2020

customer_reviews.title: only for newborns !!! Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 4 month old who is average size and he could barely wear them. They do not absorb drool well and I don't care for the spit up dribbling off them all the way down his clothes! He quickly outgrew them in the neck area, and I've thrown them away. Using normal bins that work great. I hated these things!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a bib...
customer_reviews.text: The plastic backing was perfect to prevent food and liquid from saturating through. At the end of the day it’s a bib and it collects dropped food and beverage— it’s as good as it’s going to get.
customer_reviews.author: -A

customer_reviews.title: Needs another cotton layer
customer_reviews.text: These are thin and flimsy - the absorbent layer is against the baby, and the cotton on the front, at a minimum should add another cotton layer to the back... Bought two packs, threw out packaging, so couldn't return. Went straight into the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin and not absorbent
customer_reviews.text: These are super thin and not very absorbent. The will keep the clothes dry under but the spit up will just slide down the bib onto his pants. Very unimpressed. I guess you get what you pay for...threw them in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small
customer_reviews.text: It runs very small. My son is 1 month old, and it’s near his neck. I guess by month 2 these bops might start to squire his throat. Guess this size suits the premies
customer_reviews.author: Archie

customer_reviews.title: Such great quality for such a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was so impressed with the quality of these bibs. They have plastic backing and velcro to fasten. They're soft, the colors are vibrant, and the sayings and pictures are cute. And you cannot beat the price! 10 bibs for $8?? I'd buy them again in a second and probably will for shower gifts!
customer_reviews.author: cmp1079

customer_reviews.title: Bibs!
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t use these for teething, I use the drool bibs instead. I use these bibs for feeding her food, helps with not letting the food bleed into her shirt, definitely easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: ABlanco

customer_reviews.title: Ok, not the best
customer_reviews.text: Can not be put in dryer, the backs are plastic and can not handle high temp. Which the velcro was more front directed sometimes scratches my baby's head/neck
customer_reviews.author: jiffiner

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart first wash
customer_reviews.text: Washed one time and it came apart at the seems. Not sure if I just lucked into a bad batch, but I expected better quality than this for the price. Glad that amazon stands behind their products and either make it right or replace the items. Thanks for that.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Burdette

customer_reviews.title: Cute but very small
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson. He was less than three months old when I got them. The bibs are cute but very tiny. Not sure how much longer I will be able to put the. Around his neck. (Ok he is a big boy but at 3 months we should still be able to use the bibs to catch bottle drool. The pictures sand sayings are cute but the picture on one bib (of a frog/toad) goes with what is written on the next "toadally cool" doesn't really make sense. Picture on bibs is fine skip the words unless you have with the picture or words ca. Stand alone.
customer_reviews.author: J. McL

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but after wear they're not staying on
customer_reviews.text: These were great at first - wonderful colors and cute little animals and sayings. Not to mention they were nice and water resistant to my drooling, teething, baby. After just a few months of wear the Velcro is not working very well at all. The part that connects to the velcro is very small in comparison and has started to wear away. We wash only on gentle cycle but they still aren't holding up nearly as well as other brands we've purchased. We still are using them, though, since they're not destroyed completely - yet!
customer_reviews.author: CRGidge

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For the the pack it is a great value. Drawback the velco is not constant on each bib. Seems to be stonger on some and weaker on the others. Or kiddo gets random strength to pull some off over the others. Many of the bibs are silly/cute. Sadly there is no cat bib.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Listen these bibs are affordable, easy to wash, can go in the dryer without shrinking (I use on low), and still fit my 17 month old. What more can you ask for? Not to mention, you get 10 of them. I have purchased the boy colors and the girl colors for two different children and both sets were super cute! If you need bibs, add these to your collection because you definitely need as many bibs as you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Halimah S.

customer_reviews.title: They get the job done. Good price!
customer_reviews.text: My son doesn't really like to keep bibs on so mainly use the when I feed him table food. I really like the plastic behind. One thing I noticed is they can't be too long in the drier or else they get crinkly. Other than that they are pretty good and get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: APEREZ

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I have some of these already had to buy more. They are OK for dribble and little spills but it does stain with milk and you do have to wash them daily. But the quality is good they haven't threaded out or rip so far. 1 has glitter on it which is not good for a baby as it's used close to their face.
customer_reviews.author: Kizzy Mc Lean-Celestin

customer_reviews.title: The worst you can ever get!
customer_reviews.text: You don’t believe how smell these will be after 4-5 ( wash and dry ) ! Disgusting !! The worst items I got from online ever!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Alsaffar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and very small neck
customer_reviews.text: They are very small. It is difficult to fasten them behind my son's neck. We got these when he was 6 months old and now he's 10 months old and they fall right off because they don't fasten. They are made of a very cheap material. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Woehl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a bust infant room and they have held out. Only 3 stars for the absorbency and teething as those were not the reasons I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim West

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: We needed extra bibs since obviously you can never have enough baby bibs so we decided to buy Neat Solutions bins because they have overall good reviews. The bibs we got looked the same as listed, they are cute and fit well. However, they are not that absorbent and after a couple washes some of them lost their Velcro. Even though the price isn't bad I'd spend a little extra and buy a different brand, you will end up doing that anyways when the Velcro stops working.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: The little girl I babysit is three months old and ...
customer_reviews.text: The little girl I babysit is three months old and she just started drooling I went to put these on her and they would not go around her neck they are too small. I got a piece of elastic and pinned them from one side to the other
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Q

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: So these bibs are cheap but I use so many that I’m happy to have them. They do get moldy if you don’t wash them right after baby eats. I wash them and let them dry and then put them in the washing machine whenever I’m washing his things. Overall I guess you do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Charm S

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is at the point where he drools a lot and this has been an amazing product. His shirts don't get wet anymore, easy to wash, fast dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP CHEAP CHEAP
customer_reviews.text: These bibs suck.. they are cheaply made.. mine came with 8 instead of 10, one of the many reasons I returned them. They just feel extremely cheap, it doesn’t absorb anything because the terry cloth feels like those postpartum underwear that the hospital gives you.. overall I returned them would rather spend more money to get other ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lucero Edith

customer_reviews.title: Kind of disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They are kind of cute but they become much more smaller after couple time of washing :(( now I need to buy again or find bigger ones. Reasonable price tho
customer_reviews.author: Farzee

customer_reviews.title: for the price they do a fine job. My daughter would soak through an all-terry ...
customer_reviews.text: A couple of caveats about these bibs: First, they are a polyester back with a terry front so they are not particularly soft or flexible. Second, because of the poly backing, they will melt in the dryer unless run on delicate. That being said, for the price they do a fine job. My daughter would soak through an all-terry bib and we were going through them like crazy, that's not a problem with these bibs. There are nicer bibs out there, but if you're looking for functional, drool-resistant, cute and inexpensive these do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good Value but Makes Crinkly Noise
customer_reviews.text: At less than $1 per bib, these are a good value. The bibs with words on them are not that cute, but I will use them for night time feedings when I am just using for 20 minutes then tossing into the hamper. The bibs with pictures are pretty cute for wearing with outfits, but they do make a sort of crinkly sound and they are a bit stiff, so they could get in baby's way while rolling around and playing. However, if you have a younger baby, or older baby who drools or spits up a lot, I believe that these bibs would protect clothing very well from wetness.
customer_reviews.author: RVA78

customer_reviews.title: Just another shoddy product
customer_reviews.text: After 3 or 4 washes the cheap shoddy velcro does not hold . Seems like a good product as per photos but just another sub standard product.
customer_reviews.author: inxs

product_meta.title: Neat Solutions Girl 10 Pack Water Resistant Bib Set
product_meta.description: Color:GirlOne thing every new mom needs is lots of bibs. This 10 pack Bib Set provides a double layer of protection with a terry outer layer and a water resistant backing to help keep baby dry.
feature_bullets: Keep messes to a minimum - capture dribbles, spills and food before they get to your baby's clothing! This cute and convenient 10 pack of water-resistant Feeder bibs is perfect for infants 6 months and beyond especially your little self-feeders.
Made to keep your baby drier, each bib is lined to provide water and moisture resistance.
The handy hook and loop closure fastens securely in the back and offers more adjustability than snaps alone.
Utility 10 pack - infants may use up to a dozen bibs per day! The Neat Solutions bib 10 pack offers terrific Value.
Perfectly giftable - Neat Solutions bibs are a perfect gift for any new parent and an essential for baby registries.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars3,472 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
